title: The Social drinker and the anti-social driver
creator_credit: Charles Cahill, Charles Cahill and Associates and Jim Tartan
brief_description: Statistical analysis of many automobile accidents involving drinking drivers, suggests the concept that it may not be the problem drinker that is primarily responsibile for most accidents on the road, but rather the social drinker.
title_for_label: The Social drinker and the anti-social driver
